summary:
Brief Bio:

I consider myself a passionate software developer, always trying to expand my horizons by learning about new technologies and programming languages.

My first real language was C++ where I developed game engines in my free time. I have since worked with a wide set of languages and technologies both professionally and in my own personal projects, from games to distributed web apps, where I gained an appreciation for many different types of languages and paradigms.

My current interests lie in functional programming, writing scalable, distributed services and most of all writing simple, maintainable code.

Check out my github(s): 

https://github.com/kalouantonis
https://github.com/antoniskalou

I worked closely with members of various teams throughout my stay, involving myself with different domains and applying my expertise as needed. 

Scala was the main programming language on the backend and the one I worked with the most, with some Java, SQL and Typescript here and there as required. I learned a lot about internet infrastructure and networking while working on various services dealing with mail (SMTP specifically) and DNS. 

I also enjoyed working closely with the Data Protection Officer, auditing our persisted and in-transit data while also attempting to find vulnerabilities in our infrastructure or application code.', 'title': 'Senior Software Engineer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 853368, 'name': 'Floyd & Hamilton - Recruitment Software en Websites', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQE46F1qD3mc1w/company-logo_400_400/0/1592217585416?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=kcb23ZD2g24EFs-DucrqKC74vnPTBDVJcIuiQJ_0Fpk', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/floyd-&-hamilton/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Floyd & Hamilton - Candidate Driven Recruitment Technology', 'description': "Worked on backend services in Clojure, testing and improving stability of core services. I also made changes to development culture, encouraging use of testing, code review and continuous deployment.

I was frequently tasked with doing DevOps for deploying Kubernetes clusters with ansible and maintaining high availability for the running containerized services.

The company was not a good fit for me, so I decided to depart shortly after joining. While unfortunate, I believe this was a good learning experience as to what I'm looking for in a company going forward.", 'title': 'Senior Software Engineer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 5252415, 'name': 'JOHAN Sports', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQF0V2QDfU-jvA/company-logo_400_400/0/1534956569179?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=obKo682faqGJbpzKPscOGRrQf8y8-wVwnwTWHIvvm44', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/sportsjohan/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Noordwijk ZH, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'JOHAN Sports', 'description': "Senior full stack engineer, developing systems that analyze 100's of GB of data a month.

Built systems for the entire software stack. This includes a custom C++ USB device interface for identifying and finding the mount points of custom embedded tracker devices, a React + Electron application built in Clojurescript to manage the synchronization and validation of the devices to the web app, which was written in Javascript, AngularJS. These were brought together with a Python backend that utilized Django, Numpy, Pandas, Celery, MySQL, RabbitMQ and more.

Our services are hosted on a Kubernetes cluster on AWS that I was responsible for setting up, monitoring and maintaining.", 'title': 'Senior Software Engineer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'DeltaQuest Group', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Limassol, Cyprus', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}, 'company': 'DeltaQuest Group', 'description': 'Was responsible for the back-end of 2 rails based projects, everything from general architecture design, to management of what goes where and why and full test coverage with Capybara, RSpec and Mocha (JS). I was placed in charge of code reviews for both of them.

Later down the line, Python was used along with Pandas & Scipy for statistical calculations on platform data, with a small front-end written in flask.

Lastly, I built a distributed discovery service in around a weeks time, utilising full test coverage, channel based concurrent request handling, a custom TCP protocol, Redis and configuration file extensibility written in (my favourite of the languages) Clojure.

I have undertaken the task of deploying and restoring Debian servers when needed.', 'title': 'Software Developer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'HavenVilla LTD', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Paphos, Cyprus', 'date': {'start': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2012}}, 'company': 'HavenVilla LTD', 'description': 'Maintained legacy PHP4 code and converted much of the code to modern PHP with codeigniter.

The web site involved 2 parts. The user pages, which involve grabbing data from MySQL for various villas and apartments and displaying them to the user, in a modern, easy to navigate interface.

The admin panel consisted of standard accounting software with direct manipulation of database elements, given a clean UI. The whole thing was written from scratch in old school, spaghetti PHP, which is where most of my work went, converting and cleaning up the entire code base.', 'title': 'Web Developer', 'employment_type': None}]}]
